byline.original: By MICHAEL J. de la MERCED

abstract: DealBook online; Boutique investment bank Dean Bradley Osborne announces hiring of veteran bankers Mathew Hein and David DeRuff as it pursues expansion.
lead_paragraph: Dean Bradley Osborne has recruited tech deal makers Mathew Hein and David DeRuff as partners and will change its name to DBO Partners.

headline.main: Boutique Investment Bank Expands With Two Hires

snippet: Dean Bradley Osborne has recruited tech deal makers Mathew Hein and David DeRuff as partners and will change its name to DBO Partners.
